title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins – Blue Polyester, Gold Embroidered Texts, 17 x 17 inches

Elevate your holiday table with this elegant set of 12 Christmas cloth napkins featuring a serene Nativity-inspired design and beautifully embroidered gold text. Crafted from smooth, glossy polyester, these washable and reusable napkins bring festive charm and meaningful symbolism to your celebrations.

Key features:
- Design theme: Nativity scene ambiance with Jesus-themed, faith-forward sayings
- Embroidered words: Joy, Love, Blessed, Merry, Believe, Peace
- Color and finish: Rich blue napkins with a smooth, glossy finish and gold embroidery
- Material: Durable polyester
- Size: 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm)
- Quantity: Set of 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins
- Reusable: Washable and designed for repeated use
- Ideal for: Christmas gatherings, holiday meals, church events, and other religious or festive occasions
- Gift-ready: A thoughtful gift for family, friends, or fellow believers

Why you’ll love it:
- Festive elegance: The blue-and-gold palette adds a refined, celebratory touch to place settings.
- Meaningful details: Faith-inspired words spark joy and reflection at the holiday table.
- Easy care: Sturdy polyester holds color and embroidery, making post-party cleanup simple.
- Versatile use: Perfect for dinners, brunches, and seasonal events throughout the holidays.

Package includes:
- 12 x embroidered Christmas cloth napkins (17 x 17 inches)

Notes:
- Size tolerance: Slight variations may occur due to manual measurement.
- Color variation: Display settings may cause slight color differences.
- Trademark information: Embroidered words are used for expression only and are not used as trademarks.

Create a warm, reverent, and stylish tablescape this season with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins.
